name: Pages Build
question: Does GitHub Pages deployment produce hidden clones beyond the detected actions/checkout step?

hypothesis.reasoning: The workflow has 1 explicit actions/checkout. Pages build pipeline may add additional internal clones. If pages-build-deployment is excluded from traffic (community claim), could be 0. If internal operations produce clones, could be >1.

actions.notes: Enable Pages (Settings > Pages > main branch /docs) BEFORE triggering. Disable Pages AFTER experiment to prevent contamination.

results.notes: If delta > 1, Pages infrastructure produces hidden clones â€” explains part of the NCSI anomaly. Disable Pages after experiment.
